page.title: 04Crymych choir.
page.content: In my spare time I enjoy singing.I am a member of Crymych choir.We practise every Tuesday from 7.45 to 9.30 in Preseli school hall.Lately we have been practising twice a week as we will be competing at the Cardigan Eisteddfod next week and at the National Eisteddfod the first week in August.We shall be going to London in October to sing as part of the "Thousand Voices" in the Royal Albert Hall.We have taken part before,in 1979 and again 2 years ago.It was a wonderful experience,one that I shall remember for the rest of my life.In 1983,the choir was invited to go to Camphere in Brittany to take part in a festival.I was chosen with seven other members of the choir to march and sing Welsh folk songs through the Breton town.This was also a memorable occasion.
